emails.subject: Welcome to hell!
emails.content:
uuuuuuuh, what, hello? You entered this store? WHY? To return a videotape? Oh let me check my system, oh you're only 20 years late.
That means you have an outstanding debt of "uuuuuhm let me calculate here" oh around 2.5 billion United American dollars.
So that means i am locking you in here, and you need to work off your debt.
There must be an introduction video somewhere.
Good luck, asshole.

emails.subject: I hate you
emails.content: But you finished game one.. yay

emails.subject: Hi baby reindeer
emails.content: I will not be your friend
